statements: DELETE FROM Geofencing WHERE location_name = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM Geofencing WHERE location_name = 'Central Park' AND radius_in_meters > 100;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 100 AND latitude = 37.7749 AND longitude = -122.4194;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 10 AND latitude = 37.123456 AND longitude = -122.987654;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM messages WHERE user_id = 456 AND message_text = 'Hello World';
DELETE FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0;
DELETE FROM messages WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM marketing_messages WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-12-31';
